name: DiscoTech
description:
Breif:

Welcome to DiscoTech a movement based rythm game that gets progressively  harder every 10 seconds!

How to play:

The dance floor will light up following the music, avoid getting hit by the rising tiles, move out of the way and use your dodge roll! 

Every ten second increment of the song you will have to pick up a note item, to regain health and avoid it exploding! Each new increment of the song adds new instruments to the mix, if you reach the end of the song you will get to select a new instrument and restart the song from the begining.

Controls:

Controller (Recommended): Left stick to move, A or B to dash

Keyboard: WASD to move, space to dash

WARNING: Contains flashing lights, may not be suitable for players with photosensitive epilepsy
